mods.abstract: The 1968 Christian Brothers College baseball team posed on the field. Team members were: Sonny Baker, Ron Barassi, Ron Benefield, Bo Briggs, Bill Brown, Geoff Bull, Chuck Clark, James Collins, Wayne Everton, Gene France, Bill Galardi, Tommy Mascari, Tom McMurry, Joe Nadicksbernd, Ed Perkins, David Roberts, Frank Rozaitis, Tim Schuth, Ken Tate, Roger Tiffany, Harry Watson, Jesse Weeks, Pat Wilson, Pat Wimmer, and Walter Wyatt. The 1968 season was a winning one, with a 10-5 record.

For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
